extensionDescription_mask.message: Mae Firefox Relay yn ei gwneud hi'n hawdd creu arallenwau e-bost sy'n cael eu hanfon ymlaen i'ch blwch derbyn go iawn.
extensionDescription_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

extensionDescriptionStore_mask.message: Mae Firefox Relay yn eich helpu i ddiogelu eich cyfeiriad e-bost go iawn - yr un sydd â'r cysylltiad agosaf â'ch hunaniaeth ar-lein. Mae'n caniatáu ichi gynhyrchu arallenwau unigryw ar hap, y gallwch eu defnyddio i gofrestru ar gyfer cyfrifon, apiau, neu gylchlythyrau, ac anfon negeseuon ymlaen i'ch cyfeiriad go iawn. Os gwelwch fod cyfrif yn anfon e-bost neu sbam dieithr, gallwch rwystro'r arallenw a bydd yn peidio ag anfon e-bost i'ch blwch derbyn. Unwaith na fydd angen y cyfrif arnoch chi mwyach, gallwch ddileu'r arallenw.
extensionDescriptionStore_mask.description: Shortened description of the extension. Must remain under 132 characters. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

labelRelayPremium.description: Alt text for the premium Relay logo. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay Premium".

firstRunP.message: Rydych wedi gosod yr ychwanegyn Firefox Relay yn llwyddiannus. I gychwyn arni, mewngofnodwch i Relay gyda'ch cyfrif Firefox.
firstRunP.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunP2.message: Rydych wedi gosod yr ychwanegyn Firefox Relay yn llwyddiannus. I gychwyn arni, mewngofnodwch i Relay gyda'ch cyfrif Firefox.
firstRunP2.description: First sentence on the first run page after installing the add-on. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay", "Relay", or "Firefox".

firstRunCollectDataLabel.message: Caniatáu i Mozilla gasglu gwybodaeth am sut rydych chi'n defnyddio'r estyniad hwn.
firstRunCollectDataLabel.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we show a toggle and ask the user if the add-on can send interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

allowDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that ALLOWS sending interaction data to Mozilla.

disableDataCollection.description: The label on the toggle that DISABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla.

firstRunPrefP_mask.message: Mae casglu data rhyngweithio, sef, pan fyddwch chi'n gwneud pethau fel clicio'r eicon Relay yn eich bar offer neu greu arallenw newydd yn ein helpu i ddysgu beth sy'n gweithio'n dda a beth allwn ni ei wella. Gallwch chi ddiffodd hyn ar unrhyw adeg yn y panel Gosodiadau.
firstRunPrefP_mask.description: On the first run page after installing the add-on, we tell the user how interaction data helps Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupStatsTitle.description: A shortened version of the word Statistics.  This panel displays the users total number of blocked and forwarded emails and other Relay usage numbers

popupNewsLink.description: The title of the navigation link for the News panel

popupSettingsShowIconInInputFields.message: Dangos eicon Relay mewn meysydd mewnbwn ar wefannau
popupSettingsShowIconInInputFields.description: In the settings panel, we display a toggle so the user can enable or disable the Relay icon in websites. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay".

popupSettingsCollectData.message: Caniatáu i Mozilla gasglu data rhyngweithio
popupSettingsCollectData.description: The label on the toggle that ENABLES sending interaction data to Mozilla. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla".

popupReportIssuesHeadline.message: Rwy'n cael trafferth gyda'r wefan hon

popupReportIssueCaseOne.message: Nid oedd yr arallenw wedi'i dderbyn gan y wefan

popupReportIssueCaseTwo.message: Achosodd ychwanegyn Relay anhawster weledol gyda'r wefan

popupReportIssueCaseThree.message: Nid wyf wedi derbyn e-bost roeddwn yn ei ddisgwyl o'r wefan hon

popupReportIssueCaseFour.message: Nid oedd yr arallenw wedi'i dderbyn gan y wefan hon

popupReportIssueCaseFive.message: Nid wyf wedi derbyn neges destun neu alwad yr oeddwn yn ei ddisgwyl o'r wefan hon

popupReportIssueSuccessBody.message: Diolch am ein helpu i wella Firefox Relay!

popupSignUpPanelIntro.message: Dechreuwch trwy fewngofnodi i Relay gyda'ch cyfrif Firefox.
popupSignUpPanelIntro.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay", OR "Firefox".

popupSignUpPanelIntro2.message: Dechreuwch arni trwy fewngofnodi i Relay gyda'ch cyfrif.
popupSignUpPanelIntro2.description: In the pop-up panel, before the user has signed in, we invite to them sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay"sssss.

popupRemainingAliases_2_mask.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupRemainingFreeMasks.message: Arallenwau e-bost am ddim sy'n weddill: $REMAINING$
popupRemainingFreeMasks.description: Tells the user how many more free masks they can make.

popupRecentlyUsedMasks.message: Arallenwau e-bost a ddefnyddiwyd yn ddiweddar
popupRecentlyUsedMasks.description: Label for list of most recently used masks.

labelMaskCreated.description: In the pop-up panel, a text bubble will appear next to a new mask when it is created.

labelFromThisWebsite.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view masks only created or used on a certain website.

labelAllEmailMasks.description: In the pop-up panel, the use can view all masks they've created.

popupOnboardingMaxAliasesPanelBody.description: In the pop-up panel, when a free user has hit their mask limit, we tell them they're a power-user. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

popupTotalMasksUsed.message: Cyfanswm yr arallenwau e-bost a ddefnyddiwyd

popupMasksUsedInThisWebsite.message: Arallenwau wedi'u defnyddio ar y wefan hon

popupUpgradeToPremiumBanner.message: Uwchraddiwch i Relay Premium am fwy o ddiogelwch!

popupEducationalComponent1Body.message: Gall Relay eich helpu i ddiogelu eich e-bost lle bynnag rydych chi.

popupAttachmentSizeIncreaseBody.message: Gall Firefox Relay nawr anfon ymlaen e-byst hyd at 25MB, gan gynnwys atodiadau.

popupEndOfIntroPricingHeadline.message: Mae ein cynnig prisio agoriadol yn dod i ben cyn bo hir!

popupEndOfIntroPricingBody.message: Cymrwch Relay Premium cyn Medi 27ain a mwynhewch arallenwau diderfyn am ein pris rhagarweiniol o fis i fis.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownDays.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of DAYS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownHours.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of HOURS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. Please abbreviate if the word exceeds 5 characters.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownMinutes.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of MINUTES of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupEndOfIntroPricingCountdownSeconds.description: This label displayed on top of a large number representing the number of SECONDS of the remaining time that the introductory pricing offer is still valid. There's not much room for this, hence the abbreviation.

popupPromoBlockingButtonCopy.message: Galluogi Rhwystro E-byst Hyrwyddo ar arallenw i rwystro e-byst marchnata rhag cyrraedd eich blwch derbyn.

popupBlockPromotionalEmailsBodyNonPremiu.message: Gyda Relay Premium, gallwch rwystro e-byst hyrwyddo rhag cyrraedd eich blwch derbyn tra'n parhau i ganiatáu i chi dderbyn e-byst fel derbynebau neu fanylion cludo.

popupBundlePromoHeadline_2.message: Ychwanegwch Mozilla VPN gyda $SAVINGS$ i ffwrdd.
popupBundlePromoHeadline_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupBundlePromoHeadline_3.message: Ychwanegwch Mozilla VPN gyda $SAVINGS$ i ffwrdd.
popupBundlePromoHeadline_3.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupBundlePromoBody_2.message: Cynllun 1 blwyddyn gan gynnwys Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN am $MONTHLY_PRICE$/mis.
popupBundlePromoBody_2.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99

popupBundlePromoBody_3.message: Cael blwyddyn o Guddio Ffôn Relay Premium ynghyd â Mozilla VPN am $MONTHLY_PRICE$/mis.
popupBundlePromoBody_3.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99

popupPasswordManagerRelayBody.message: Nawr gallwch chi ddefnyddio Relay yn uniongyrchol yn eich rheolwr cyfrinair Firefox.

popupBundlePromoHeadlineFreePlan.message: Yn cyflwyno: Cynllun tanysgrifio Relay + VPN

popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.message: Uwchraddiwch eich tanysgrifiad i gael Relay Premium + Mozilla VPN am $MONTHLY_PRICE$/mis. Arbediad o $SavingS$!
popupBundlePromoBodyFreePlan.description: DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium" and "Mozilla VPN". This string includes a monthly price variable, e.g. $4.99. It also includes a savings variable, e.g. 50%

popupPhoneMaskingPromoBody.message: Gyda chuddio rhif ffôn, gallwch nawr greu rhif ffôn arall sy'n eich helpu i gael negeseuon testun a galwadau heb ddatgelu'ch gwir rif.

popupPhoneMaskingPromoBodyPremium.message: Cael negeseuon testun a galwadau heb ddatgelu'ch gwir rif.

popupCreateCustomMaskBody.message: Y cyfan sy'n rhaid i chi ei wneud yw creu a rhannu arallenw unigryw sy'n defnyddio'ch parth cyfaddas - bydd yr arallenw'n cael ei gynhyrchu'n awtomatig. Rhowch gynnig ar “shop@customsubdomain.mozmail.com” y tro nesaf y byddwch chi'n siopa ar-lein, er enghraifft.

popupCreateCustomFormError.message: Nid oedd modd creu'r arallenw. Ceisiwch eto, os gwelwch yn dda.

pageInputIconSignUpText.message: Ewch i wefan Firefox Relay i fewngofnodi neu greu cyfrif.
pageInputIconSignUpText.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSignUpButton.description: In the website content icon pop-up, before a user has signed in, we tell them to sign in. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Firefox Relay".

pageInputIconSelectFromYourCurrentEmailM.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created. This label is displayed when this is the only list visible.

pageInputIconAdditionalEmailMasks.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can re-use masks they've already created.

pageInputIconPreviouslyUsedMask.message: Wedi eu defnyddio'n flaenorol ar y wefan hon
pageInputIconPreviouslyUsedMask.description: In the website content icon pop-up, users can select specific masks they've created on the current website.

pageInputIconJoinPremiumWaitlist.description: For some free users (based on geographic region), Firefox Relay premium is not avialable yet. We instead prompt users to join our waitlist to be notified when it is available.

pageInputIconUseExistingAliasFromTheSite.message: Defnyddiwch yr arallenwau presennol o'r wefan hon…

pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.message: Rydych chi eisoes wedi creu'r nifer mwyaf o arallenwau
pageInputIconMaxAliasesError_mask.description: Tells the user they have already created the max number of masks.

pageNoMasksRemaining.message: Nid oes gennych ragor o arallenwau e-bost am ddim.
pageNoMasksRemaining.description: Error message that appears when a free tier user uses all of their masks.

profilePageInvalidAliasCharactersError.message: Nodau sydd ddim yn cael eu caniatâu: $CHARACTERS$
profilePageInvalidAliasCharactersError.description: Error message that appears when the user tries to use special characters when labelling an mask.

profilePageDefaulAliasLabelText.description: On the user's profile page, this text appears for a mask when it doesn't have a label.

popupDataCollectionBody_mask.message: Gallwch ganiatáu i Relay gasglu data dewisol sy'n ein galluogi i gydweddu labeli arallenwau eich holl ddyfeisiau â'r gwefannau lle maen nhw wedi'u creu a'u defnyddio.

popupPrivacyNoticeUpdateBody.message: Er mwyn gwella dibynadwyedd { -brand-name-firefox-relay } os nad ydym yn gallu dosbarthu e-bost, byddwn yn cadw'r e-bost dros dro ar ein gweinyddwyr nes iddo gael ei anfon. Fyddwn ni byth yn ei gadw am fwy na thridiau.

popupFreeMasksAvailable.description: Tells the user how many more masks they can make.

popupFreeMasksLimitReached.message: Rydych chi wedi defnyddio $MAXIMUM$ o'ch arallenwau rhad ac am ddim.
popupFreeMasksLimitReached.description: Tells the user they've created the maxmimum free masks

popupNoMasksCreatedHeadline.message: Diogelwch eich cyfeiriad e-bost go iawn

popupNoMasksCreatedBody.message: Defnyddiwch arallenwau Relay i gadw'ch hunaniaeth yn breifat a chael dim ond y negeseuon e-bost rydych chi eu heisiau yn eich blwch derbyn.

popupCsatSurveyText.message: Pa mor fodlon ydych chi o'ch profiadau gyda Firefox Relay?

popupCsatSurveyChoiceMadeBody.message: Hoffen ni ddysgu rhagor am sut y gallwn ni wneud yn well. A fyddech chi'n fodlon cymryd arolwg dwy funud?

popupEuCountryExpansionBody.message: Mae Firefox Relay Premium bellach ar gael yn eich gwlad. Diogelwch eich blwch derbyn gyda masgiau e-bost diderfyn, a chael parth e-bost Relay unigryw i wneud creu arallenwau wrth fynd yn hawdd ac yn ddiogel.

popupHolidayPromo2023Headline.description: Do not modify 20%. This is a holiday discount rate. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium".

popupHolidayPromo2023Body.message: Y tymor gwyliau hwn, cewch 20% oddi ar pris Relay Premiwn 1 flwyddyn. Rhowch y cod hyrwyddo “HOLIDAY20” wrth y ddesg dalu. Daw’r cynnig i ben ar 31 Rhagfyr, 2023.
popupHolidayPromo2023Body.description: Do not modify 20%. This is a holiday discount rate. DO NOT TRANSLATE "Relay Premium".

popupPhoneMasksMetaForwardingDescription.message: Ar hyn o bryd mae Relay yn anfon pob galwad ffôn a neges destun ymlaen i'ch gwir rif ffôn.

popupPhoneMasksMetaBlockingDescription.message: Mae Relay yn rhwystro pob galwad ffôn a neges destun - fyddwch chi ddim yn derbyn unrhyw beth o'ch rhif ffôn ffug.

popupPhoneMasksMetaForwardTo.description: The number that messages from the phone mask are being forwarded to.

popupPhoneMasksMetaRegistered.description: Tells the user the date their phone mask was created.

popupPhoneMasksActivateYourPhoneMaskBody.message: Fel tanysgrifiwr Relay Premium, gallwch gael negeseuon testun a galwadau ffôn heb ddatgelu'ch rhif go iawn. Cychwynnwch trwy ddewis rhif i'w ddefnyddio fel eich rhif ffôn ffug. Dim ond 5 munud y mae'n ei gymryd.

popupPhoneMasksUpgradeToPhoneMaskBody.message: Gyda ffugio'ch rhif ffôn Relay Premium, gallwch ddiogelu eich rhif ffôn go iawn a dal i dderbyn ac ateb negeseuon testun a galwadau.

popUpPhoneMasksNotAvailableTitle.message: Nid yw ar gael yn eich gwlad eto

popUpPhoneMasksNotAvailableBody.message: Gyda ffugio rhif ffôn Relay Premium, byddwch yn gallu cuddio'ch rhif ffôn go iawn yn union fel eich cyfeiriad e-bost. Dysgwch fwy ar wefan Relay a chofrestrwch i gael diweddariadau.

phoneForwardedCallsTexts.message: Galwadau a negeseuon testun wedi'u hanfon ymlaen

phoneBlockedCallsTexts.message: Galwadau a negeseuon testun wedi'u rhwystro
